name: Duke and Silva
description:
For CFN Game Jam 9/17

Have you ever wondered what something would look like if it were bigger?  

What about smaller.

Well then look no further, this is a game where you can do both of those things.

--Controls

W A S D - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse - Aim

Right Mouse - Make things small

Left Mouse - Make things big

Jay Shaffer / Programming | Art

Diane Shaffer / Level Design | Testing

Trevor Lentz / Music
